segments.text: I observe the scene unfolding in this bright kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a lovely garden, all neat and green.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, though, the sink's overflowing without anyone noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pours down, forming a puddle that's hard to ignore.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman polishes her plate, apron on, so domestic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But she's unaware of the trouble at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbs precariously toward the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool's unstable, and he's holding a plate too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits eagerly below, hand extended.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their little secret adventure warms my heart a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Still, the risks make me feel a pang of worry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.speaker: PAR
